analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Congress.executeProposal (/unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol#442-464):
	External calls:
	- ! p.recipient.call.value(p.amount)(transactionBytecode) (/unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposals (/unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol)

Congress.checkProposalCode (/unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol#398-410) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- proposals[id].proposalHash == sha3()(beneficiary,amount,transactionBytecode)

Congress.vote.vote (local variable @ /unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol#414-415) shadows:
	- Congress.vote (function @ /unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol#413-437)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x97282a7a15f9beadc854e8793aae43b089f14b4e.sol#69)
